ticker: Thank you all so much for your support over the last three years, and here's to many more!
Make sure to join our NEW VRChat group! https://vrc.group/BASS.2844
Join us as we celebrate three years with 12 DJs over Friday and Saturday night!
Thank you to all of you that visit and have made Bass Station your home. <3

performers.name: ManicLandIzzy
ticker: Please welcome our first DJ and special guest performer, ManicLandIzzy!
First train of the night, departing for Techno.
Follow ManicLandIzzy on Bluesky @maniclandizzy.bsky.social
Did you know? The Original Bass Station 1.0 featured OSHA approved staircases, functional bathrooms, and a swimming pool!

performers.name: Centigray
ticker: Departing  directly downtown to Dubstep.
Follow Centigray at linktr.ee/centigray
Did you know? The Original Bass Station 1.0 had to be shut down due to radioactive spider infestations.

performers.name: Bass Demolitia
ticker: Calling at House and Main Stage.
Follow BassDemolitia on Twitter @RDovaus
Bass Station Facts: The Poopergeist is real. So is the hoard of plumber ghosts. They are servants to the Dark Lord Bassethliux. You have been warned.

performers.name: Outland1shVR
ticker: Stopping service to Drum and Bass
Follow them on Twitter @Outland1shVR
Bass Station Info Blast: Originally upstairs had a Joe Bob's Chicken Shack that went out of business last year. We're turning it into the Bass Shop.

performers.name: Juicy Sushi
ticker: Express service to Hard Dance
Follow Juicy on Bluesky @yuudokukawa.bsky.social
The Bass Station is proud to announce that it doesn't have any pest issues, as all the walls are heavily lined with Asbestos.

performers.name: MeOwOgai
ticker: Final DJ of the night is now boarding for Psytrance
Follow MeOwOgai at @meowogai.bsky.social on Bluesky and mixcloud.com/MeOwOgai
Bass Station Service News: The Station's Intoxication station at one point offered 'Dumb Bitch Juice', 'Pilk' and if you asked, 'Liquified Anxiety' which was distilled cortisol.

performers.name: **SERVICE SUSPENDED**
ticker: Return tomorrow when the party will continue!
Please vacate the instance promptly or your avatar will be towed and crushed into a Reference Cube.

performers.name: KTZLRMZ
ticker: Now departing from platform 2 for Hard Dance
Follow Ktzlrmz at twitch.tv/maxe_killermiez
Bass Station Safety Advisory: Ballistic Frying Pans may be seen in flight due to local undead.... well at least one of the local undead.

performers.name: SolStar
ticker: Just missed the last train? Don't worry, this one is also going to Hard Dance!
Follow SolStar at mixcloud.com/SolsticeStarlight
Did you know? The Bass Station is confirmed haunted. Multiple Ghosts, undead, and a demon reside within the club. It's okay, they're cool. :3

performers.name: DJ Kandi Wolf
ticker: Boarding now for Happy Hardcore!
Follow Kandi at twitch.tv/djkandiwolf
Did you know? The graves upstairs do not contain anything of value, they do however contain curses. Some particularly nasty ones.

performers.name: T1M3K33P3R
ticker: Please welcome our second special guest DJ of the weekend, T1M3K33P3R!
Taking a rhythmic ride down to Dub
Follow T1M3K33P3R on Bluesky @jackdoesmusic.bsky.social
Bass Station Geopolitical Fact: The Bass Station is canonically located in London. (Even though the staff are mostly from the United States)

performers.name: Japhet & V[AI]RUS - B2B!
ticker: Coming to us LIVE and Back 2 Back, it's our lovely hosts!
Follow them on Bluesky @japhetbeans.bsky.social and @vairus.bsky.social
Bass Station timetable update: The 2nd Anniversary for the Bass Station was actually a month late, due to scheduling conflicts! (and maybe Japhet forgot to check his calendar...)
Fact checked Bass Station facts: The April Fools update for the club included such 'updates' like: A slip n slide, 7 new parking spots, time distortions, and rotating the club 86.3 degrees.

performers.name: **TERMINATES HERE**
ticker: This party terminates here, thank you all for celebrating with us!
See you next time for more live music!
Welcome to the Bass Station, bringing you live DJs nearly every weekend since July 2022!
